BIO

In my quest for learning as a web developer, I recently completed the University of Central Florida’s Full Stack Web Development Program where I successfully developed web applications using various cutting edge technologies, including Node.js and React.js, and common web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Checkout some of these apps on my portfolio page. I am a life long learner with degrees in anthropology and teaching. I have lived throughout the United States and now reside in Florida with my dog, Roddy. I have worked as both a teacher and as a flight attendant and am embarking on a new career as a web developer.
